title: Connector Scaffold Result v1
description: Result of connector scaffold generation: complete file plan for a new MOVA connector skill.

connector_id.description: Echo from the request: identifier of the connector skill.

connector_dir.description: Echo from the request: directory name for the connector.

files.description: List of files to create/overwrite in the repository for the new connector.

relative_path.description: Path relative to repository root, e.g. 'skills/connectors_cloudflare_queues/manifest.skill.json', 'skills/connectors_cloudflare_queues/mova/ds/ds.cloudflare_queue_create_request_v1.schema.json'.

content.description: Full content of the file (markdown/JSON/TypeScript/etc. as text).

kind.description: Type of file for operator convenience.

notes.description: Short comment if needed, e.g. 'review this binding manually'.

registry_snippet.description: Optional JSON fragment for insertion into lab/skills_registry_v1.json (in the format already accepted by the registry).
